item.title: Mapping an Undocumented API Easily With Python
item.description: I was working on an NBA related project the other week and I had decided I wanted to create my own API wrapper (for fun) as part of the project. The primary source of data I was looking to use was the stats.nba.com API, our biggest challenge in using this endpoint is the fact they do not want to use it.
